section.title: Object Based Software Transactional Memory.
section.para:
OSTM is a polymorphic solution to store and manage shared memory spaces within c++ programming context.
You can store and managed any kind of object in transactional environment as a shared and protected memory space.

section.title: Brief. Download the zip file from the provided link in the web-site, that contains the libostm.so, TM.h, TX.h, OSTM.h files.
section.para: Unzip the archive file to the desired destination possibly where in you program is stored.

section.title: Step 2: Unzip in the target destination.
Step 3: Copy the shared library (libostm.so) to the operating system folder where the other shared library are stored.
section.para: It will be different destination folder on different platforms. (Linux, Windows, Mac OS) More Information

section.title: Step 4: Achieve the required class hierarchy between the OSTM library and your own class structure.
section.para: Details and instruction of class hierarchy requirements can be found on the web-site. www.serversite.info/ostm

section.title: Step 5: Create an executable file as you linking together the TM.h, TX.h, OSTM.h files with your own files.
Step 6: Now your application use transactional environment, that guarantees the consistency between object transactions.
